title: Minecraft Volume Beta已经完成并开始发售
author: a20001017
txt_content:
来自Bandcamp的部分：
原文较长,隐藏
Immediate download of 30-track album in the high-quality format of your choice (MP3, FLAC, and more), plus unlimited mobile access using the free Bandcamp listening app.
……省略了唱片曲目集

The second official soundtrack of Minecraft. 140 minutes in length and extremely varied. 


Featuring the all-new creative mode, menu tunes, the horrors of the nether, the end's odd and misleading soothing ambiance and all the missing record discs from the game! 


It's my longest album ever, and I hope you'll love the amount of work I crammed into it.creditsreleased 09 November 2013


现在可以下载拥有30首曲目的任意高品质格式(MP3格式,FLAC格式等等等等),外加无限制用手机上的Bandcamp应用来“试听”。

第二枚Minecraft的录音碟，140分钟长而且丰富多彩。

内容有将来全新的创造模式音乐，主菜单音乐，地狱中恐怖的声音，末地的怪声音，让人舒缓的音乐还有丢失的（游戏中的）唱盘。

这是我做过的最长的录音碟，我希望你能喜欢这么多我在制作时都沉浸其中的音乐。

来自Twitter的
Minecraft Volume Beta on iTunes: https://https://itunes.apple.com/us/album/minecraft-volume-beta/id739831644
Minecraft Volume Beta on Bandcamp:https://c418.bandcamp.com/album/minecraft-volume-beta


正版碟价格7美元或者更多（约合42.63人民币）请大家支持正版

replies.author: kaho
replies.txt_content: 嗯！？7美金！表示赶快求我同学买一个0W0

replies.author: Nupzshsh
replies.txt_content: 记得以前看到过你的签名。。

replies.author: LittleHei
replies.txt_content: 要是mc正版也是7美元就好了。。。。

replies.author: pogox
replies.txt_content: 作为原声，7刀的价真心厚道

replies.author: seraph0012
replies.txt_content: 这内容不是和我9号发的帖子一样么。

replies.author: zdyxiaokeai
replies.txt_content: 比周大木的专辑便宜多了...果断入

replies.author: 几重凛
replies.txt_content: 作为一个穷屌丝，这个很为难啊！
